title: AI models given $10K to compete in first-of-its-kind crypto-trading competition - and most crashed and burned
description: The "Alpha Arena" pits the six most popular artificial intelligence programs in a crypto-trading competition to see which is independently smart enough to master the market and maximize their investment.
content:
Four of the most popular AI programs crashed and burned in a cryptocurrency investing competition — with most losing over 50 percent of the money they were instructed to maximize.
Only two Chinese programs managed to turn even a modest profit.

title: It was a 'perfect' job interview, until ‘tiny twitches’ made him question reality. 'Wasn't even human'
description: A Reddit users unsettling experience during an online job interview has gone viral after he realized his interviewer might not have been human. What began as a normal video call turned eerie when he noticed repetitive movements, emotionless responses, and identical answers to repeated questions. The post sparked a heated discussion online about the growing use of AI in hiring, with users debating whether candidates should be informed when interacting with artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Philippines, Asean data center markets surge amid AI-driven costs - study
description: SOUTHEAST Asia’s data center construction sector is expanding rapidly as artificial intelligence (AI) transforms regional demand for digital infrastructure, according to Turner & Townsend’s 2025 Data Centre Cost Index. The report shows that the Philippines, Malaysia, and Indonesia are among the fastest-emerging hubs, even as rising construction costs and power challenges test the pace of growth.
